thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 10 of 657
thread.title: Krissy

author: Krissy
title: Krissy
text: Let me first say this is an honest review and I don't usually take the time out to write reviews. But my experience with framesdirect.com was awesome! I checked numerous sites for the same frame and found them cheaper...So I contacted frames direct and spoke with a very nice lady who said they price matched (as long as it was a US based site). After placing my order, I just knew they were going to send an email saying the frames were on backorder...But they didn't! I received my frames in a week and I love them (they are Caviar by the way)!! I can't find this designer anywhere in my area and I've received so many compliments! Thanks again frames direct! You guys rock!
